entry.title: Re Hack💡: If you just want to do volume but not take too much risk you can e.g take a long position on Polynomial and then balance it out with a sh...
entry.summary: Re Hack💡: If you just want to do volume but not take too much risk you can e.g take a long position on Polynomial and then balance it out with a short position on another trading platform. This way your position is hedged and you are not taking on market risk but doing volume.
